user.title: ADS Connection
user.description: Configure the connection to your ADS device (TwinCAT PLC).

data_description.device: The AMS Net ID of your ADS device (e.g., 192.168.1.100.1.1)
data_description.ip_address: The IP address of your ADS device (optional if routing is configured)

import.title: Import from YAML
import.description: Your YAML configuration for ADS Custom has been automatically imported. You can now remove the `ads_custom:` section and related platform entries from your configuration.yaml file.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the ADS device. Please check your configuration and ensure the device is reachable.

abort.already_configured: This ADS device is already configured
abort.entity_type_not_supported: This entity type is not yet supported

init.title: ADS Options
init.description: Choose an action to manage your ADS entities.

add_entity.title: Add Entity
add_entity.description: Select the type of entity you want to add.

configure_switch.title: Configure Switch
configure_switch.description: Configure a switch entity that controls a boolean variable on your PLC.

configure_sensor.title: Configure Sensor
configure_sensor.description: Configure a sensor that reads a numeric or string value from your PLC.

data_description.name: Friendly name for the sensor
data_description.adstype: The data type of the PLC variable

configure_binary_sensor.title: Configure Binary Sensor
configure_binary_sensor.description: Configure a binary sensor that reads an on/off state from your PLC.

data_description.name: Friendly name for the binary sensor
data_description.adstype: bool for boolean, real for floating-point

configure_light.title: Configure Light
configure_light.description: Configure a light entity that can be turned on/off and optionally dimmed.

data_description.adsvar: The PLC variable for on/off control
data_description.name: Friendly name for the light
data_description.adsvar_brightness: PLC variable for brightness (leave empty for on/off only)
data_description.adsvar_brightness_scale: Maximum brightness value (255 for HA standard, 100 for Beckhoff)
